title: Google\Cloud\Language\V1\AnnotateTextResponse
name: AnnotateTextResponse
description:
The text annotations response message.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.language.v1.AnnotateTextResponse

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.sentences
params.description: Sentences in the input document. Populated if the user enables [AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_syntax][google.cloud.language.v1.AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_syntax].

params.name: data.tokens
params.description: Tokens, along with their syntactic information, in the input document. Populated if the user enables [AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_syntax][google.cloud.language.v1.AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_syntax].

params.name: data.entities
params.description: Entities, along with their semantic information, in the input document. Populated if the user enables [AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_entities][google.cloud.language.v1.AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_entities].

params.name: data.document_sentiment
params.description: The overall sentiment for the document. Populated if the user enables [AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_document_sentiment][google.cloud.language.v1.AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_document_sentiment].

params.name: data.language
params.description: The language of the text, which will be the same as the language specified in the request or, if not specified, the automatically-detected language. See [Document.language][google.cloud.language.v1.Document.language] field for more details.
